name: Generic Asteroid Game - Jam Build
description:
Protect the Earth from an ever-growing amount of asteroids using the experimental force field spacecraft! Try not to crash it though!

Controls:

The spacecraft will follow your cursor. Left click to activate the force field.

Attributions:

Down arrow icons created by Freepik - Flaticon (Play button)

Refresh icons created by Gregor Cresnar - Flaticon (Replay button)
